description: Submission that contains submitted metadata objects
title: Submission

text_name.title: Searchable Submission Name, used for indexing

workflow.title: Name of the workflow
workflow.description: Each submission is created according a specific workflow, which is indicated by this field

dateCreated.title: Unix time stamp of creation, used for indexing

datePublished.title: Unix time stamp of publishing, used for indexing

lastModified.title: Unix time stamp of when objects in submission were last modified

creators.title: Creators
creators.description: The main researcher(s) involved in producing the data, or the author(s) of the publication.

items.title: Main researcher(s) involved with data or the author(s) of the publication.

name.description: This field will be constructed based from Given Name and Family Name.
name.title: Full name.

affiliation.title: Affiliations
affiliation.description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator. Upon filling the form with the organization or institution suggestion will be made from Research Organization Registry (ROR) Community API.

name.title: Name of the place of affiliation

schemeUri.description: Name identifier scheme. This will default to https://ror.org/ .
schemeUri.title: URI (location) of the affiliation scheme

affiliationIdentifier.description: URI location based on the URI scheme of the name identifier this will be pre-filled based on https://ror.org/name.
affiliationIdentifier.title: Location of affiliation identifier

affiliationIdentifierScheme.description: Identifier scheme name. This will default to ROR.
affiliationIdentifierScheme.title: Name of affiliation identifier scheme

nameIdentifiers.title: Creator Identifiers
nameIdentifiers.description: Uniquely identifies the creator, according to various schemas, e.g. ORCID, ROR or ISNI. Use name identifier expressed as URL.

schemeUri.description: Depending on the name identifier scheme e.g. https://isni.org/ or https://orcid.org/ or https://ror.org/ or https://www.grid.ac/ .
schemeUri.title: Scheme of the URI (location) of the name identifier

nameIdentifier.description: URI location based on the URI scheme of the name identifier e.g. https://orcid.org/nameIdentifier.
nameIdentifier.title: URI (location) of name identifier.

nameIdentifierScheme.description: Identifier scheme name e.g. ORCID, ROR or ISNI.
nameIdentifierScheme.title: Name of identifier scheme.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: Information describing the subject of resources

subject.title: Subject name
subject.description: Subject, keyword, classification code, or key phrase describing the resource. The accepted subject names are based on the field of science classification specified by OKM.
enum: 213 - Electronic, automation and communications engineering, electronics
3142 - Public health care science, environmental and occupational health
319 - Forensic science and other medical sciences
6131 - Theatre, dance, music, other performing arts

subjectScheme.title: Subject scheme name
subjectScheme.description: The name of the subject scheme or classification code or authority if one is used

schemeUri.title: Scheme URI
schemeUri.description: The URI of the subject identifier scheme

valueUri.title: Value URI
valueUri.description: The URI of the subject term

classificationCode.title: Classification Code
classificationCode.description: The classification code used for the subject term in the subject scheme

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: A list of keywords or tags describing the resources. It is recommended to use a controlled vocabulary, ontology or classification when choosing keywords. Multiple keywords can be added, separating them by comma.

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: The person(s) responsible for contributing to the development of the dataset.

name.description: This field will be constructed based from Given Name and Family Name.
name.title: Full name.

affiliation.title: Affiliations
affiliation.description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator. Upon filling the form with the organization or institution suggestion will be made from Research Organization Registry (ROR) Community API.

name.title: Name of the place of affiliation

schemeUri.description: Name identifier scheme. This will default to https://ror.org/ .
schemeUri.title: URI (location) of the affiliation scheme

affiliationIdentifier.description: URI location based on the URI scheme of the name identifier this will be pre-filled based on  https://ror.org/name.
affiliationIdentifier.title: Location of affiliation identifier

affiliationIdentifierScheme.description: Identifier scheme name. This will default to ROR.
affiliationIdentifierScheme.title: Name of affiliation identifier scheme

nameIdentifiers.title: Contributor Identifiers
nameIdentifiers.description: Uniquely identifies the contributor, according to various schemas, e.g. ORCID, ROR or ISNI. Use name identifier expressed as URL.

schemeUri.description: Depending on the name identifier scheme e.g. https://isni.org/ or https://orcid.org/ or https://ror.org/ or https://www.grid.ac/ .
schemeUri.title: Scheme of the URI (location) of the name identifier

nameIdentifier.description: URI location based on the URI scheme of the name identifier e.g. https://orcid.org/nameIdentifier .
nameIdentifier.title: URI (location) of name identifier.

nameIdentifierScheme.description: Identifier scheme name e.g. ORCID, ROR or ISNI .
nameIdentifierScheme.title: Name of identifier scheme.

dates.title: Dates
dates.description: List of relevant dates to publication. The type of date can vary and it is recommended to add information if appropriate to distinguish between dates.

date.title: Date
date.description: A standard format for a date value.

dateType.title: Date Type
dateType.description: Relevance of the date for the resources being submitted.

dateInformation.title: Date Information
dateInformation.description: Specific information about the date, if appropriate.

descriptions.title: Descriptions
descriptions.description: Additional information about the resources that does not fit in any of the other categories, or general descriptions that are supplemental to the descriptions added for Study or Datasets.

geoLocations.title: GeoLocations
geoLocations.description: Spatial region or named place where the data was gathered or where the resources are focused.

geoLocationPoint.title: Geolocation Point
geoLocationPoint.description: A point location in space. A point contains a single longitude-latitude pair.

geoLocationBox.title: Geolocation Box
geoLocationBox.description: The spatial limits of a box. A box is defined by two geographic points. Left low corner and right upper corner. Each point is defined by its longitude and latitude.

geoLocationPolygon.title: A drawn polygon area, defined by a set of polygon points

language.title: Language
language.description: Primary language of the submitted resources.

relatedIdentifiers.title: Related Identifiers
relatedIdentifiers.description: Information about a resource related to the one being registered, primarily used to provide series information or a text citation where the related resource does not have an identifier. It is also optional to provide such an identifier.

relatedIdentifier.title: Identifier
relatedIdentifier.description: These must be globally unique identifiers and correspond to the type selected. e.g. 10.2022/example.78m9865 for DOI identifier Type

relatedMetadataScheme.title: Related Metadata Scheme
relatedMetadataScheme.description: To be used only with this relation pair: (Has Metadata/Is Metadata For). Example DDI-L

schemeUri.title: Related Metadata Scheme URI
schemeUri.description: To be used only with this relation pair: (Has Metadata/Is Metadata For). Example: http://www.ddialliance.org/Specification/DDI-Lifecycle/3.1/XMLSchema/instance.xsd

schemeType.title: Related Metadata Scheme Type
schemeType.description: To be used only with this relation pair: (Has Metadata/Is Metadata For). Examples: XSD, DDT, Turtle

alternateIdentifiers.title: Alternate Identifiers
alternateIdentifiers.description: An identifier or identifiers other than the primary or related identifier applied to the resources being registered. EGA identifier(s) obtained, that can be used as an alternative to the current resources.

items.title: Identifier(s) other than the primary identifier of the resources

sizes.title: Sizes
sizes.description: Size (e.g., bytes, pages, inches, etc.) or duration (extent), e.g., hours, minutes, days, etc., of a resources. Examples: '15 pages', '6 MB', '45 minutes'.

formats.title: Formats
formats.description: Use file extension or MIME type where possible, e.g., PDF, XML, MPG or application/pdf, text/xml, video/mpeg. We will pre-fill some of them based on what was filled in metadata.

fundingReferences.title: Funding References
fundingReferences.description: It is recommended to supply funding information when financial support has been received. The funder will be identified by their Research Organization Registry (ROR).

items.title: Information about financial support for producing the resources

funderIdentifierType.title: Funder Identity Type
funderIdentifierType.description: The type of funder identifier, one of Crossref Funder ID, GRID, ISNI, or ROR.

awardNumber.title: Award Number
awardNumber.description: The code assigned by the funder to a sponsored award.

awardTitle.title: Award Title
awardTitle.description: The human readable title of the award.

awardUri.title: Award URI
awardUri.description: The URI leading to a page provided by the funder for more information about the award (grant).

doi.title: A persistent identifier for a resource

url.title: URL of the digital location of the object

types.title: Type info of the resource. Multiple types can be listed: ResourceTypeGeneral, schemaOrg etc.

doi.title: A persistent identifier for a resource

url.title: URL of the digital location of the object

types.title: Type info of the resource. Multiple types can be listed: ResourceTypeGeneral, schemaOrg etc.

publisher.title: Full name of publisher from Research Organization Registry

tags.title: Different tags to describe the object.
Different tags to describe the draft object.

resourceId.title: REMS id of the resource created. Created automatically during the publication process

catalogueItemId.title: REMS id of the catalogue created. Created automatically during the publication process

files.title: The list of files attached to a submission and their status

version.title: Version of a file to identify it in the file collection.

objectId.title: Object the file is attached to. Note: we might need to verify checksums in object and on the version or somehow sync them.

schema.title: Schema to identify the collection for the accessionID of the object.

status.title: Status to describe the file in the sda-pipeline.
status.description: Status can be one of: added (initial status), ready (ready for ingestion, this status represents a metadata object has been assigned to a file), verified (file has been successfully ingested), completed (metadata and dataset ID has been assigned to the file), failed (an error has occurred in a step).

error.title: Ingestion error message
error.description: Error message in case the ingestion failed
